name: Call of Duty: Black Ops
description: This version installs the multiplayer, which is needed for some dependencies in certain maps.
notes: Current iteration requires manually editing "config_mp.cfg" in the game's `players` folder if a blur effect envelopes the screen on ADS. Look for a line labeled `seta r_dof_enable`. Set the value to `"0"`.

script.custom-name: Call of Duty Black Ops MP

content:
custom-name: Call of Duty Black Ops MP
game:
  appid: 42710
installer:
- task:
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\AppDefaults\BlackOpsMP.exe
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: winxp
winesteam:
  Audio: alsa
